component.text: Modificación de la ID del router en el R1

component.feedback: *** Debe introducir el comando exacto y completo.***
component.existingcommands: Muestre la ID del router actual para los protocolos IPv6.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ospf 10"
Router ID 10.1.1.1
Number of areas: 0 normal, 0 stub, 0 nssa
Redistribution:
Ninguno
R1#
command.instruction:
• Establezca la ID del router OSPF IPv6 del R1 en 1.1.1.1.
  • Vuelva al modo EXEC privilegiado.

command.deviceresponse: <font Face="Courier New">Reload or use "clear ipv6 ospf process" command, for this to take effect</font>

R1#
*Mar 25 19:46:09.711: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
R1#
command.instruction: Borre el proceso de routing de OSPF IPv6 como se indica. Verifique que los procesos OSPF se borren respondiendo con una “y”.

command.deviceresponse:
R1#
00:01:58: %OSPFv3-5-ADJCHG: Process 1, Nbr 2.2.2.2 on Serial0/0/0 from FULL to DOWN, Neighbor Down: Adjacency forced to reset
< output omitted >
R1#
command.instruction: Verifique que la ID del router haya cambiado.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ospf 10"
Router ID 1.1.1.1
Number of areas: 0 normal, 0 stub, 0 nssa
Redistribution:
None
R1#
command.instruction: Modificó correctamente la ID del router OSPF.
